summary: In order to prove his fatherhood potential to his pregnant girlfriend, Frank 'kidnaps' her 12-year-old nephew and tags along on his best friend Casper's debauched weekend canoe trip.
cast: Frank Hvam|Casper Christensen|Marcuz Jess Petersen|Mia Lyhne|Iben Hjejle|Lars Hjortshøj|Tina Bilsbo|Mads Lisby|Anne Moen|Niels Weyde|Elsebeth Steentoft|Roger Kormind|Michael Carøe|Dya Josefine Hauch|Marie Mondrup|Claus Damgaard|Bent Fabricius-Bjerre|Jørgen Leth|Michael Meyerheim|Ole Michelsen|Mads Brügger|Mikael Bertelsen|Ib Michael|Niels Helveg Petersen|Ole Sørensen|Kenneth Carmohn|Sebastian Christensen|Ann Sofie Vejby|Nadia Bjerregaard|Mikkel Mikkelsen|Malte Weiss|Medina|Lea Baastrup Rønne|Marie Bach Hansen|Christian Østergaard Sørensen|Simon Kvamm|Sune Wagner|Thomas Helmig|Peter Sommer|Søren Rasted|Remee|Björn Gustafsson|Barbara Zatler|Rasmus Haxen|Barbara Borchorst|Linda Fallentin|Bjørn Diedrichsen|Leif Willer Jensen|Karoline Munksnæs|Hother Bøndorff|Sami Darr|Sadi Tekelioglu|Morten Jensen|Morten Vinther|Stine Chen|Michael Frandsen|Knud Westphal Eriksen|Paw Terndrup|Roger Matthisen|Cecilie Ishøj|Heidi Petersen|Astrid Søjberg|Josephine Jacob|Cecilia Black|Maria Van Huisstede|Ida Lee|Kadija Jalloh|Helene Marie Blixt|Nanna Liliendal|Heino Skovgård|Sabrina Ziyada
title: Klovn: The Movie
